**Description**: A user defined name assigned to the job
**Value**: Any combination of letters and numbers

**Description**: Maximum time the job will be allowed to run
Amount of memory the job requires per **node**
**Value**: <number>[units] where units are K for kilobytes; M for megabytes; G for gigabytes or T for terabytes

**Description**: Number of tasks of the job
Number of tasks assigned to a node
Partition/queue where the job will be submited
**Value**: cpu384g, cpu1500g, cpu6000g, gpu1h100, gpu2h100 or hgxh200

**Description**: File where the standard output will be written. You can use placeholders to control the file naming scheme (see https://slurm.schedmd.com/sbatch.html#SECTION_FILENAME-PATTERN)
**Value**: Any combination of letters and numbers

**Description**: File where the standard error will be written. You can use placeholders to control the file naming scheme (see https://slurm.schedmd.com/sbatch.html#SECTION_FILENAME-PATTERN)
**Value**: Any combination of letters and numbers

**Description**: The job cannot share nodes with other running jobs
Return an estimate of when a job would be run
